section.heading: Optional form for amendment by owner.
section.text: The following form may be used by an owner to make an amendment under § 42-1622:

include.text: Amendment by Owner to Remove an Unlawful Restriction.

para.text: This amendment is recorded under the Uniform Unlawful Restrictions in Land Records Amendment Act of 2024 ("Act") by an owner of an interest in real property subject to an unlawful restriction as defined under the Act.
The owner's property that is subject to the unlawful restriction is described as follows:
This amendment amends the following document:
Recording date of document being amended:

This amendment removes from the document described in paragraph (3) all unlawful restrictions as defined under the Act. Removal of an unlawful restriction through this amendment does not affect the validity and enforceability of any other restriction that is not an unlawful restriction as defined under the Act, at the time of filing this amendment. This amendment is not effective if the property is subject to a governing instrument as defined under the Act.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 106 of Unlawful Restrictions in Land Records Emergency Amendment Act of 2024 (D.C. Act 25-476, May 29, 2024, 71 DCR 6682).
